column4: In nautilus in the Places sidepane I have a link to an old mount that isn't there any more. Is there a way to delete this link?
It is a link to mount windows. I installed a new harddrive and moved some partitions around. Now I have a link called 53 GB Filesystem and one called windows. The 53 GB link mounts to /media/windows.
sudo rm /media/windows (you can try sudo umount /media/windows prior to rm)
